item.title: Dashboard - Covid-19
item.description: In this project I will be taking some of the SQL queries I worked in the SQL data exploration project Covid19 Data Cleansingand creating visualization in Tableau. Create dashboard Total Deaths per continent Percent population infected ( actual and estimate) Percent population infected per country Global numbers (Total cases, deaths, and death percentage)
